sections.heading: to 2-8B-51 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1991 (1st S.S.), ch. 3, § 50 repealed 2-8B-1 to 2-8B-51 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1982 (3rd S.S.), ch. 1, §§ 1 to 51 relating to the 1982 Senate Reapportionment Act, effective December 18, 1991. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1990 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
